definitions.definition: a person who performs duties for others, especially a person employed in a house on domestic duties or as a personal attendant.
examples: attendant, retainer; Moredomestic (worker), (hired) help, cleaner; lackey, flunky, minion; maid, housemaid, footman, page (boy), valet, butler, manservant; housekeeper, steward; drudge, menial, slave, water boy; archaicscullion "servants were cleaning the hall"Moredomestic (worker), (hired) help, cleaner; lackey, flunky, minion; maid, housemaid, footman, page (boy), valet, butler, manservant; housekeeper, steward; drudge, menial, slave, water boy; scullion servants were cleaning the hall

definitions.definition: a person employed in the service of a government.
a devoted and helpful follower or supporter.
